title: Grilled Sausage with Potatoes and Green Beans Recipe
description: Grilled sausage and vegetables are easy to cook on the grill in a foil packet — perfect for camping or a crowd-pleasing summer meal!
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes BBQ & Grilling Pork Grilled Sausage with Potatoes and Green Beans 4.6 (731) 534 Reviews 53 Photos Grilled sausage with tender red potatoes, onion, and green beans. This recipe is easy to cook in a foil packet on the grill. Plus, clean-up is a breeze! Submitted by Tonya Merriman Updated on March 23, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 53 53 53 53 Prep Time: 25 mins Cook Time: 20 mins Total Time: 45 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings ¾ pound fresh green beans, trimmed and halved ½ pound red potatoes, quartered 1 large onion, sliced 1 pound smoked sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon ground black pepper 1 teaspoon vegetable oil 1 teaspoon butter ⅓ cup water Directions Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. Place green beans, red potatoes, onion, and sausage on a large sheet of foil. Season with salt and pepper, sprinkle with oil, and top with butter. Tightly seal foil around the ingredients, leaving only a small opening. Pour water into the opening, and seal. Place foil packet on the preheated grill. Cook 20 to 30 minutes, turning once, until sausage is browned and vegetables are tender. I Made It Print 924 home cooks made it! Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Grilled Sausage with Potatoes and Green Beans 01 of 53 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 53 Photo by  Retmtrcp 06/24/2021 03 of 53 Photo by  Sunshine0620 05/06/2021 04 of 53 Photo by  csichick27 11/02/2020 05 of 53 Photo by  Jess Snow 05/03/2020 06 of 53 Photo by  Lisa 04/16/2020 I made this tasty, quick meal in the oven! My family truly enjoyed! I will make this dish year-round!!! It’s a winner!!! 07 of 53 Photo by  taylorfae 04/04/2020 08 of 53 Photo by  Penny Overton 01/24/2020 09 of 53 Photo by  Bridget Siljander 09/30/2019 10 of 53 Photo by  Tmacmeghan3 09/22/2019 Absolutely delicious! My fiancé and I made this and tweaked it just a little. We added corn, garlic cloves, and Cajun seasoning. We also grilled brats instead of using the sausage. The char from the grill on those brats really set it off! We will definitely be making this again. name: Tonya Merriman
instructions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.;Place green beans, red potatoes, onion, and sausage on a large sheet of foil. Season with salt and pepper, sprinkle with oil, and top with butter. Tightly seal foil around the ingredients, leaving only a small opening. Pour water into the opening, and seal.;Place foil packet on the preheated grill. Cook 20 to 30 minutes, turning once, until sausage is browned and vegetables are tender.
